titleStmt.title: The Iesuites catechisme. Or Examination of their doctrine. Published in French this present yeere 1602. and nowe translated into English. VVith a table at the end, of all the maine poynts that are disputed and handled therein
Catechisme des Jesuites. English
titleStmt.author: Pasquier, Etienne, 1529-1615.
Watson, William, 1559?-1603.

notesStmt.note: A translation by William Watson of: Pasquier, Etienne. Le catechisme des Jesuites.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
